Text: How is this possible? It's 20:36 in US and this episode doesn't even air until 22:00. Has VTV's account been hacked?
Never mind. I see other trusted uploaders have it too, so no way all those accounts could be hacked.
Canada probably has earlier air time

It doesn't make sense that an earlier air time in Canada would be the reason. Why not early every week then and not just tonight? I checked CTV's schedule. Airs same time as in US, 10 PM. It does have the CTV logo on it so obviously there was an early feed that was picked up.
